mapper.select: select h.home_id, h.home_purchase_date, h.home_purchase_value, h.home_area, h.home_type, h.auto_fire_notification, h.home_security_system, h.swimming_pool, h.basement from home h where h.customer_id = #{customerId};

select h.home_id, h.home_purchase_date, h.home_purchase_value, h.home_area, h.home_type, h.auto_fire_notification, h.home_security_system, h.swimming_pool, h.basement from home h left join home_policy hp on h.home_id = hp.home_id where hp.policy_id=#{policyId};

select h.home_id, h.home_purchase_date, h.home_purchase_value, h.home_area, h.home_type, h.auto_fire_notification, h.home_security_system, h.swimming_pool, h.basement from home h where h.home_id = #{homeId};
